Full of Self
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Full of Self
By King952 on Friday, May 21, 2004 - 03:57 pm:

CHB thinks my work is to macabre. This has... a light tone to it. Enjoy.

His spiked hair,
She’s real fair.
She’s tryin,
To not care.

She makes him so excited.

His piercings,
Her clear skin.
Keeps tryin,
but wearin thin.

And he doesn’t wanna fight it.

His band shirt and ripped knees,
She tries,
Gets weary.
She’s falling in love.

She’s his sugar rush.

His toes show,
Through his shoes.
She can’t hold it,
He’s breaking through.

He just can’t get enough.

So he asks, her out,
She tries,
To not shout.
She didn’t want them to know.

He’s falling, not stopping.

And so he,
Kills him self,
Because she,
Was full of herself.

Death.

By King952 on Friday, May 21, 2004 - 04:00 pm:

And so he,
Kills him self,
Because she,
Was full of herself.


change this to...

And so he draws sword from sheath,
Cuts self deep,
Because she,
Was full of herself.

I enjoy your poems, as do most others. Remember that.
